question: The "Atacama Giant" is an anthropomorphic geoglyph located in which nation?
explanation: "Atacama Giant" is an anthropomorphic geoglyph located in Atacama Desert, Chile. A geoglyph is a design or motif made up of stone, stone fragments, gravel and earth, formed on the ground. It is a form of land art. It is the largest prehistoric anthropomorphic figure in the world.
